scripts.npm-publish-beta: if [ -f lib/package.json ] ; then npm publish ./lib --tag beta; else echo echo "no need to publish"; fi
scripts.npm-publish: if [ -f lib/package.json ] ; then npm publish ./lib; else echo echo "no need to publish"; fi
scripts.postversion: cp package.json lib && cp -r lib lib2 && mv lib2 lib/lib
